title: HitRecord on TV Season 1 Complete (Episodes 1-8) 720p Xvid
description:
HitRecord On TV (Season One 720p)
=================================

Season 1 Episodes 1-8 (all released between 2014-01-01 and 2014-03-01)

  <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3453566/?ref_=ttep_ep_tt" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt3453566/?ref_=ttep_ep_tt</a>

Converted videos to reduce from a larger resolution for users with older XP computers so the videos will play properly with audio and video in sync on slower machines (1072p reduced slightly to 720p). 

I used the MediaCoder x64 0.8.30.5622 tool to encode the new videos. I found the tool worked fairly well but when encoding failed, it was difficult to diagnose and fix the problem.


MOST WERE:
 - MPEG4/AVCorAAC, 1912x1072 (1080p), Aspect 1.0, 16:9 (1.78:1), 
   23.98 FPS, Progressive, Matroska (.mkv)

CONVERTED TO:
 - Xvid/AVCorAAC,  1280x720  (720p),  Aspect 1.0, 16:9 (1.78:1), 
   23.98 FPS, Matroska (.mkv)


Enjoy "HitRECord on TV" series that started in 2014 and contribute if you can... I think it is a great show (A new kind of production company) directed by Joseph Gordon-Levitt. I hope it continues to entertain us for many seasons to come (visit www.hitrecord.org to collaborate).


-----------------------------------------------------------------------
FILES:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 1.  HitRecord_On_TV_S01Ep01_The_Number_One.mkv
 2.  HitRecord_On_Tv_S01Ep02_Fantasy.mkv
 3.  HitRecord_On_Tv_S01Ep03_Trash.mkv
 4.  HitRecord_On_Tv_S01Ep04_Space.mkv
 5.  HitRecord_On_Tv_S01Ep05_The_Other_Side.mkv
 6.  HitRecord_On_Tv_S01Ep06_Games.mkv
 7.  HitRecord_On_Tv_S01Ep07_Money.mkv
 8.  HitRecord_On_TV_S01Ep08_Patterns.mkv

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE that episodes 1, 6, 7 were renamed from:

 1.  HitRecord.On.TV.S01E01.720p.WEB-DL.AAC2.0.h.264-BTN.mkv
 6.  HitRecord.On.TV.S01E06.720p.Games.WEB-DL.AAC2.0.H.264-FANT.mkv
 7.  HitRecord.On.TV.S01E07.720p.Money.WEB-DL.AAC2.0.H.264-FANT.mkv

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks for all previous uploaders who provided the original mkv files before I re-encoded them.

Sorry no samples or screenshots generated but the quality for each episode is superb (perfect) but at a slightly lower resolution (was almost 1080p at 1912x1072 reduced to 1280x720 which is 720p).

muscule_boy
